attributes.action: Nottingham tram works have caused chaos for Broxtowe residents. When it opens, all residents of NG9  and 10 should receive free travel for 1 year.
attributes.additional_details: Nottingham tram works have caused major disruption to Chilwell High Road, Toton Lane and other areas. Bardills island has been horrendous to navigate. Promises have been made and broken too many times. The Tram company will possibly offer 1 free trip. The residents of Toton, Stapleford, Chilwell, Beeston and Long Eaton have put up with this chaos for too too long.
